code: import React from'react';import styles from'../styles/ProjectCard.module.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ProjectCard(_ref){let{title,previewImage,techIcons,description,repoLink,deployLink}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.projectCard,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.preview,onClick:()=>window.open(deployLink,'_blank'),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:previewImage,alt:`${title} preview`})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.details,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.techIcons,children:techIcons.map((icon,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:icon,alt:"Tech Icon"},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.description,children:description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:styles.button,onClick:()=>window.open(repoLink,'_blank'),children:"Reposit\xF3rio"})]})]});}export default ProjectCard;
